scripts.grun-gui: cd src/antlr/ && java -cp ".;../../lib/antlr-4.9.3-complete.jar;.." org.antlr.v4.gui.TestRig antlr.BasicJava prog -gui ../app/tests/test0.txt
scripts.gen-compile-debug: npm run antlr-gen && npm run java-gen && npm run grun-gui
scripts.gen-compile: npm run antlr-gen && npm run java-gen
scripts.gen-jgen-test: npm run antlr-gen && npm run java-gen && npm run test
scripts.gen-compile-output: npm run gen-compile && npm run output
